extendedInfo.description: You must be a current Ctuit RADAR customer to use this application.Manage your business with access to your restaurant data anywhere, anytime. Ctuit's mobile application, On The Flyâ¢, delivers your restaurants' critical data to your Android device. With On The Flyâ¢, you can communicate with your team through the Online Manager Log and monitor sales, labor and time clock data at the organization, location and check level detail. By adding Intraday Polling and configuring multiple polling times throughout the day, you don't have to wait until tomorrow to know how you performed today.

reviews.title: Long Awaited!
reviews.comment: Simple, user friendly app! Love the pmix features and the ability to access logs via mobile!
reviews.author: Mike Dasso

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: It would be nice to view labor scheduling information though, so I don\'t have to use the desktop site. Also, allot of key reports...if I was able to view would be helpful. But very smooth app
reviews.author: Randi Wuhl

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: Has all the tools you use on a regular basis plus a few handy options that are more easily found on this app than the desktop version
reviews.author: Garrett Vomfell

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: 2.99 i guess isn\'t bad to have your dashboard at your fingertips.
reviews.author: Jason Peters
